name: Participation in science activities in the past 12 months, by family income and education: 2020
description: Participation in science activities in the past 12 months, by family income and education: 2020

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_participated_in_a_medical_or_clinical_research_study
variableMeasured.description: Participated In A Medical Or Clinical Research Study

variableMeasured.name: field_made_observations_or_collected_data_samples_as_part_of_a_science_research_project_such_as_observations_about_bird_animal_and_plant_life_or_weather_air_and_water_quality_
variableMeasured.description: Made Observations Or Collected Data Samples As Part Of A Science Research Project Such As Observations About Bird Animal And Plant Life Or Weather Air And Water Quality

variableMeasured.name: field_contributed_to_a_science_related_online_crowdsourcing_activity_such_as_classifying_stars_and_galaxies_or_identifying_animals_
variableMeasured.description: Contributed To A Science Related Online Crowdsourcing Activity Such As Classifying Stars And Galaxies Or Identifying Animals

variableMeasured.name: field_helped_a_child_with_a_science_project_whether_for_school_or_for_an_outside_school_activity
variableMeasured.description: Helped A Child With A Science Project Whether For School Or For An Outside School Activity

variableMeasured.name: field_participated_in_a_maker_movement_or_hack_a_thon_event_to_develop_new_technologies_devices_or_software
variableMeasured.description: Participated In A Maker Movement Or Hack A Thon Event To Develop New Technologies Devices Or Software

variableMeasured.name: field_donated_money_to_support_medical_or_science_research
variableMeasured.description: Donated Money To Support Medical Or Science Research

notes: See Table SPPS-17 for standard errors. Responses are to the following: Thinking about things you have done outside of work over the past 12 months, have you ever done the following?
sources: Pew Research Center, American Trends Panel Wave 67 (2020), conducted 29 April–5 May 2020.Science and Engineering Indicators
